General.Name: COL Digital Publishing Group Co Ltd
General.Description: COL Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the digital publishing business in China. It sources licensed digital content through its online platform, famous authors, and copyright agencies; and distributes digital reading products to various terminals, platforms, and media outlets. The company also focuses on literature IP, as well as creates a range of derivative forms of web fiction, including audiobooks, short and medium drama series, animation, film, and merchandise. In addition, it operates Chapters, an interactive visual reading platform. The company was formerly known as COL Digital Publishing Group Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to COL Group Co.,Ltd. in April 2023. COL Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Yonghe Plaza West Building E, Beijing, China, 100007
